mapper.select: SELECT lc.LARGE_CATEGORY_NAME "LCNAME", COUNT(*) "COUNT", NVL(SUM(c.CONSUME_PRICE),0) "SUM" FROM CONSUME c RIGHT JOIN LARGE_CATEGORY lc ON (lc.LARGE_CATEGORY_ID = c.LARGE_CATEGORY_ID) AND MEMBER_ID = #{VALUE} GROUP BY lc.LARGE_CATEGORY_NAME

SELECT lc.LARGE_CATEGORY_NAME "LNAME", COUNT(*)/(SELECT COUNT(m.MEMBER_ID) FROM MEMBER m WHERE 10 <= m.AGE AND m.AGE <= 19) "COUNT", NVL(SUM(c.CONSUME_PRICE),0)/(SELECT COUNT(m.MEMBER_ID) FROM MEMBER m WHERE 10 <= m.AGE AND m.AGE <= 19) "SUM" FROM CONSUME c RIGHT JOIN LARGE_CATEGORY lc ON (lc.LARGE_CATEGORY_ID = c.LARGE_CATEGORY_ID) AND c.MEMBER_ID IN ( SELECT m.MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER m WHERE 10 <= m.AGE AND m.AGE <= 19 ) GROUP BY lc.LARGE_CATEGORY_NAME;

SELECT lc.LARGE_CATEGORY_NAME "LCNAME", sc.SMALL_CATEGORY_NAME "SCNAME", c.CONSUME_PRICE "PRICE" , to_char(c.CONSUME_DATE,'mmdd') "DATE" FROM LARGE_CATEGORY lc LEFT JOIN CONSUME c ON (lc.LARGE_CATEGORY_ID = c.LARGE_CATEGORY_ID), SMALL_CATEGORY sc WHERE sc.SMALL_CATEGORY_ID = c.SMALL_CATEGORY_ID AND MEMBER_ID = #{VALUE} ORDER BY "DATE"
